name: Kakada Ramprasad
address: 348/343, Ground Floor, Mint Street, Sowcarpet, Chennai

menu.name: Royal Chicken Biryani
menu.desc: An Authentic Hyderabadi Biryani where succulent Chicken piece is marinated with a blend of spices, layered with the finest Basmati Rice and Dum Cooked with generous portions of Saffron and Ghee.

menu.name: Special Mutton Biryani
menu.desc: Enjoy the special taste of exclusive spice marinated tender and juicy Lamb pieces, enough to share between two persons that are Dum cooked along with the finest of Basmati Rice

menu.name: Egg Biryani
menu.desc: A flavorful medley of finest Basmati Rice, boiled Eggs, and aromatic spices. Ideally for one person but can be shared between two.

menu.name: Supreme Veg Biryani
menu.desc: The authentic Veg delicacy seasoned with herbs and spices and then layered into fine grain Basmati Rice and cooked to perfection.

menu.name: Chicken Kebab Platter
menu.desc: An assorted variety of Moroccan Chicken Kebab, Chicken Pepper Marinate, Chicken Reshmi Kebab & Chicken Garlic Kebab served with Pudina chutney. Comes in a tamper-proof sealed pack, easy to carry. (8 pcs)

menu.name: Tandoori Chicken (Half)
menu.desc: The King of all kebabs, spiced full Chicken with bone, finished in a Tandoor. (2 pcs)

menu.name: Qubani Ka Meetha
menu.desc: A sweet treat from Hyderabad, this heavenly dessert comprises of dried apricots and sugar, enriched with saffron strands and rose water.
